name: Apothecary Candle
description:
5  Fragrances to choose from. 

Vanilla 

Fresh Whipped Vanilla and Warming Musk make up the timeless scent that we all have come to know and love. 



Lavender Vanilla 

Classic French lavender and irresistibly sweet vanilla. An enticing blend of two fragrance favorites and our personal favorite.



Spa

This fragrance invokes feelings of a relaxing day at the spa. Fresh marine and citrus accords are blended with just a hint of flowers and musk. Truly relaxing.



Sensual Amber 

An indelibly rich scent, this fragrance is a blend of vanilla steeped in delicious spices with sensual, dark patchouli and velvet floral absolutes.



Sweet Sandalwood

Fresh grains of sensual, warm sandalwood dominate this exotic fragrance. A touch of classic, creamy vanilla adds some sweetness to this mysterious woody wonder aroma.
